welcome_message_body: Welcome to Powell River, Canada! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming town situated on the beautiful Sunshine Coast. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the unique experiences our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Powell River Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gillies Bay Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Gillies Bay Airport handles private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comox Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Courtenay Airport serves domestic flights to and from major cities in Canada.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Courtenay Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mansons Landing SPB Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mansons Landing SPB Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
